name: Amendments to application
text:
Amendments to the application, including joinder, substitution, or discontinuing as to parties, shall be allowed by the court at any time upon terms that are just and reasonable.  All amendments shall be in writing, signed, and sworn to, like the original.
	The court may at any time order an application to be amended by striking out one or more of the parcels or by a severance of the application. [L 1903, c 56, §23, pt of §24; RL 1925, §3212, pt of §3213; RL 1935, §5017; RL 1945, §12617; RL 1955, §342-18; HRS ]
